扵字的基本解释

扵
yú
古同“於”。

扵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wū］
［《廣韻》哀都切，平模，影。］
亦作“扵1”。
(1)鸟名。参见“於鵲”。
(2)叹词。
[②]［yú］
［《廣韻》央居切，平魚，影。］
亦作“扵2”。
(1)在。
(2)往。
(3)为（wéi）。
(4)跟从；亲近。
(5)依靠。
(6)居。
(7)厚待；款待。
(8)泛谓对待。
(9)介词。从；自。
(10)介词。在。
(11)介词。至，到。
(12)介词。向。
(13)介词。犹以。
(14)介词。对，对于。
(15)介词。与；跟；同。
(16)介词。比。表示比较。
(17)介词。被。表示被动。
(18)介词。给。
(19)介词。如。
(20)介词。依。表示行为的依据。
(21)连词。犹而。
(22)连词。与，和。
(23)助词。语助词，无实义。
(24)助词。结构助词。犹之。
(25)助词。表示语气。
(26)古代地名。
(27)姓。汉时有於单。见《汉书·景武昭宣

扵字的康熙字典解释
扵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
扵字的起名意思

暂无。

Hu
Basic explanation of words
Hu
yú
Gu Tong "Yu".
Hu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wū］
["Guangyun" mourning all cut, flat model, shadow. ]
Also known as "扵1".
(1) The name of the bird. See "Yu Que".
(2) Interjection.
[②]［yú］
["Guangyun" Yang Juqie, Pingyu, Shadow. ]
Also known as "扵2".
(1) In.
(2) Towards.
(3) is (wéi).
(4) Follow; get close.
(5) Rely on.
(6) Home.
(7) Favor; hospitality.
(8) Treat in general terms.
(9) Prepositions. From; from.
(10) Prepositions. in.
(11) Prepositions. To, to.
(12) Prepositions. to.
(13) Prepositions. Still to.
(14) Prepositions. Yes, yes.
(15) Prepositions. With; with; with.
(16) Prepositions. ratio. Represents comparison.
(17) Prepositions. Be. Indicates passive.
(18) Prepositions. give.
(19) Prepositions. Such as.
(20) Prepositions. according to. Indicates the basis of the behavior.
(21) Conjunctions. Still.
(22) Conjunctions. And, and.
(23) Particles. Auxiliary words have no real meaning.
(24) Particles. Structural particles. Still it.
(25) Particles. Express the tone.
(26) Ancient place names.
(27) Last name. Han Shiyou Yudan. See "Han Shu·Jing Wu Zhaoxuan
